content:
Let's add these expenses to the template. Here's the updated table:

**2018 Honda Civic**

| Date | Vehicle | Category | Description | Cost | Mileage | Notes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |

| 02/18/2023 | 2018 Honda Civic | Maintenance | Oil Change | $25.00 |  |  |
| 02/18/2023 | 2018 Honda Civic | Maintenance | Air Filter Replacement | $25.00 |  |  |

Let me know if you want to add the odometer reading for the oil change and air filter replacement. If you don't have the exact reading, you can leave it blank or estimate it.

Next, do you have any expenses for your Trek FX 3 hybrid bike or 2015 Yamaha FZ6R motorcycle that you'd like to add to the template?
